headline: Assessing Cummins (CMI) Valuation As It Expands From Diesel Engines Into Batteries And Hydrogen Fuel Cells
summary: Cummins (CMI) is drawing fresh attention as recent coverage focuses on its shift toward batteries, hydrogen fuel cells, and low emission solutions, while legacy diesel engines and power systems continue to generate steady revenue. See our latest analysis for Cummins. Recent attention on Cummins’ clean energy push comes as the share price sits at $522.03, with a 90 day share price return of 20.24% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 48.72%. This indicates that momentum has been strong...
